long_description: Designed for a day of fun in the backcountry, the Granite Gear Habanero 28 Pack is also ideal for commuting and travel. Plenty of pockets and tie-ins let you haul all the gear you need for the day. Padded shoulder straps and hipbbelt with mesh pockets. Sternum strap has a buckle that works as a whistle. Single aluminum stay frame and side compression straps support and stabilize your load. Dual bottle holsters; fleece-lined pocket; internal mesh zippered pocket; external zippered pockets. Hydration sleeve and port (reservoir sold separately). Dual tool attachment; carabineer lash points. The Granite Gear Habanero 28 Pack features a built-in raincover. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for a day of fun in the backcountry, the Granite Gear Habanero 28 Pack is also ideal for commuting and travel. Plenty of pockets and tie-ins let you haul all the gear you need for the day.
